text: Niemojów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Międzylesie, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. Prior to 1945, it was located in Germany. It lies approximately west of Międzylesie, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital, Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Niemojów
